definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Pang Juan (-342 BC), military leader and political strategist of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
Liu Juanzi, legendary alchemist and creator of magic potions
Liu Juanzi's medical recipes bequeathed by the ghost Huang Fugui 黃父鬼|黄父鬼
pinyin: Liu2 Juan1 zi3 gui3 yi2 fang1

definition: every drop returns to the public good (idiom); not one penny is misused

sentences.english: Speaking of Chen Juan, in your mind what kind of response is singing?
sentences.chinese: 說起陳涓，在你的腦海中迴響的是怎樣的歌聲？

sentences.english: Later Sun Bin was framed by Pang Juan and the Prince of Wei had his kneecaps cut out .
sentences.chinese: 後來，孫臏受龐涓陷害，被魏王剜掉了兩個膝蓋骨。

sentences.english: Xiaojuan Ban, University of Science and Technology Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: 涓班，科技北京，中國大學。

sentences.english: This is to appreciate over Chen Juan concert given in the evaluation of the person.
sentences.chinese: 這是很多欣賞過陳涓演唱的人給出的評價。

sentences.english: Disabled Sun Bin was not discouraged and tricked Pang Juan by pretending to be mad .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏殘疾後，並不氣餒，靠裝瘋騙過了龐涓。

sentences.english: Sun Bin did much better than Pang Juan and Pang Juan was deeply jealous of him .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏的學業遠遠勝於龐涓，龐涓很嫉妒他。

sentences.english: Sun Bin did much better than Pang Juan and Pang Juan was deeply jealous of him .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏的學業遠遠勝於龐涓，龐涓很嫉妒他。

definition: to weave/to lay warp for weaving/silk thread for weaving/variant of 紉|纫, to sew/to stitch/thread
name of a river in Hubei
